yeah
whats the "but"

Hey Person,

Thanks for jumping on that call, sounds like a good plan all around.

In followup, we'll plan on sending you a build by EOD today for your team to show Nike tomorrow morning (Thursday 7/3) for final feedback.

On that front, what time can we expect compiled feedback tomorrow? Think it would be great to shoot for 3pm so our teams can have a quick discussion about how much time it will take to accomplish. Not knowing what or how much feedback there will be at that point, I want to make sure we're able to provide a realistic deployment time to communicate back to Nike. 

If the Tuesday deployment is what has been communicated to the client and is a time we need to make sure we stick to, it would be great if your team can prioritize the feedback before we talk so we can let you know how much of it we see being able to hit by that time. 

If you're feelin' good about Nike's response and don't foresee any major changes but maybe a bug or two, we should be in a good spot to deploy Tuesday morning/afternoon/whatever but want to make sure we have a check in on the books in case that feedback is more than we've currently accounted for.

Thanks,

Karen
read that
let me know if a cleaned up version of that is okay to send
let me know when i can call
Sounds good. You could call any time!
ok
kill the /whatever
:grinning:
oh yeah
abby took a pass at helping me and i just copied what she typed.
Almost passed out in the kitchen earlier so I should probably leave early today.
I'm pretty sure I'll be on my computer when I get home so feel free to send bugs/questions my way. See you all tomorrow.
cool gaston, please stay alive
Thanks <@U026PHQ3J>, it's probably heat + sleep + eating junk all week. I'll be fine.
didn't mean to paste that in the large group. sorry
